Title: A quarter of Russians combat stress with proper nutrition, shows....
Description: A quarter of Russians combat stress with proper nutrition, shows a study by the Romir holding, which is available to TASS. Expenditures on fresh fruits and vegetables in Russia account for almost 12% of the budget. Also over the year, the number of people using sports as a way to deal with stress has increased (19%).

Title: Fighting in Ukraine can end in four ways, military correspondent ...
Description: Fighting in Ukraine could end in four ways, military correspondent Anthony Loyd told The Times. One of them implies a military defeat of Ukraine, the second - Ukraine’s renunciation of some territories, the third - freezing the conflict, the fourth - an even greater pumping of weapons into Ukraine and the introduction of sanctions against the Russian Federation.

Description: On January 26, Belarus will hold presidential elections for the seventh time in history. Five candidates are vying for the post, including the current President Alexander Lukashenko, who has been leading the country for more than 30 years.

Title: About 100 thousand people demonstrated in Berlin against the Alte...
Description: About 100 thousand people demonstrated in Berlin against the Alternative for Germany party, the Bild newspaper reported. Participants also protested against Donald Trump and Elon Musk, who supports the AfD.

Title: Trump decided to transfer bombs to Israel, the supply of which wa...
Description: Trump has decided to transfer bombs to Israel, the supply of which had been suspended under Biden, the American portal Axios reported. The White House ordered the lifting of the ban on the 'supply of bombs weighing 2,000 pounds to Israel,' the portal’s source said.
